itemDes: The Boat Tail has a unique two-tone exterior custom high-end finishes inside and even a hosting suite complete with a champagne fridge and built-in sun umbrella.
Battery Life: 13.5” AMD Ryzen™ 5 Microsoft Surface® Edition processor – up to 19 hours 15” AMD Ryzen™ 7 Microsoft Surface® Edition processor.
It has a dedicated laptop compartment, inside pen/phone pockets, front and back zipper compartments, side compartments and padded shoulder straps.

itemName: Pre-owned IWC Pilot Chrono Chronograph Anthracite Dial Men's Watch IW388002
